issue.title: LWG 270 and ranges version of binary search algorithms

discussion.p:
LWG relaxed the requirements for comp of binary search algorithms (). However, the relaxation doesn't seem automatically applied to ranges versions, because ranges versions of these algorithms constrain the Comp types with indirect_strict_weak_order.
Perhaps we should additionally say some semantic requirements of indirect_strict_weak_order aren't imposed for these algorithms or change the constraints.
discussion.note: St. Louis 2024-06-24; set priority to P3
